models.name: Starter — Phi-3 Mini Instruct (Q4_K_M)
models.notes: Runs on most laptops; best reach vs size. Great default if unsure.

models.name: Standard — Mistral 7B Instruct (Q4_K_M)
models.notes: Better phrasing; typical modern laptops are fine.

models.name: Pro — Qwen2.5 7B Instruct (Q4_K_M)
models.notes: Best quality in this size; prefers ≥16 GB RAM.
